76287BA0405CDC88D2A639A12D3B38ED: Changes the visibility of the video player when receiving a signal on this channel. This will also enable collision as determined by the Enable Collision setting, above.
4CEC0B9244F11230FF882CA7A5B262D4: Disable the device when receiving from this channel.
B418BE514F0E388CF50346810C55922D: Disable the visibility and collision of the video player when receiving a signal on this channel.
3EA807C84D105046B636E8AB01B8B727: Disables collision on this device when receiving on this channel.
DEE92D1A40588D77BF64B5A16A34C080: Disables others modes and reverts back to priority mode.
6E3A15E24B3A39D9277CCC93351B258B: Enable Priority Mode When Receiving From
F092102C46BBEBD89B9697BFE87F3ACA: Enable Screen Mirroring When Receiving From
60B608EA4783616092AE95935A91BF87: Enable the device when receiving from this channel.
4B774A9F4BF0BCEC62FE70B5797908EF: Enables Mirroring this screen to the configured screen
EEBD80534655FFAABC785A9DEAA35B09: Enables collision on this device when receiving on this channel.
92D72EE74807424762F2C0A2CC0DD42D: End External Streaming Video When Receiving From
BAD64DB14FABD9CED1E1D6959BD4CC88: Ends control by an external streaming source when receiving on this channel.
FC5B1CB54275DF75F6F7F18649CEC66C: Enter Full Screen When Receiving From
79B752584045753F6677F0A916D7C8B4: Enters Full Screen when receiving a signal on this channel
0A86CF0F42CF582E3A22BEB9DE60031B: Exit Full Screen When Receiving From
35FA79E14C9E9A701DA7E6A839E4D499: Exits Full Screen when receiving a signal on this channel
9B15CAAD42CED1F834C98FA60D210AF8: Hides the picture-in-picture window when receiving on this channel.
A30E40154E3018428FBF78872F087759: If any streaming device has forced control of the stream, this will release it and play the best stream in line based on priority.
C232C5E2476114C67633EB881A6CD990: Make PIP Default Size When Receiving From
2C4B4615426A1CB1D5B51ABBF2126238: Make PIP Full Screen When Receiving From
31BBEC994F03B24F2E768DAEC975AC66: Makes picture-in-picture default size when receiving on this channel.
441FA36D4908DD601CC047A55EA8409E: Makes picture-in-picture full screen when receiving on this channel.
8319E25949078B94492A5E941EB245BC: Override Stream Config When Receiving From
C08E7E4742B12B5DD1BAB69FC9EF4659: Overrides the current streaming video with data sent from another device
ECEA8F2C48647324DA495997C79D7108: Restart this stream from the beginning when receiving a signal on this channel.
309B2DEB4668AE2E471C9CBC0B788212: Seek to Triggered Seek Time when receiving on this channel. Caution: The stream will pause while the video buffers when seeking.
40E8ACD9423E7C633A94AEB7BEAD66C7: Set and lock control to an externally-supplied stream source when receiving on this channel.
17DA4A3B4AF34644F804708E6734E23E: Stop All Streaming When Receiving From
FEF9484141FFD8D46386F7A910400229: Stops the currently playing stream and starts the custom stream on this player with the audio only playing from this device. Stream priority will not work until control is released.
C6E87DF34323A3BB0D56DAB9B04119A6: Transmits a signal when this device becomes plays a stream to start mirroring on another video player.
59B62A6D4CA0734038C735967852DE2E: Transmits a signal when this device becomes the controlling streaming device.
80E70F73429A292171FAD086626F7E27: Turn off all video streaming devices of this type on the island when receiving on this channel.
983861AD451F982EA903F5A7AE10BD5F: Update To External Stream Source When Receiving From
623ED2E041DED41EABAD07AC6F6D71DE: Use this device to stream videos on your island. Only one video can be shown at a time.
356626DB4FD370F9C3243F800B4C8D17: Use this device to watch streaming video
B3B0563F444E46351B4086B02D6387CB: Use this device to watch streaming video
CFE41CFA418F5DE16B6231B195F65DCC: When Should Start Mirroring Transmit On

UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.CutoffAdjustment: Controls the tolerance for the greenscreen color detection. A lower value means less tolerance when detecting color to mask, a greater value means a wider tolerance for color variations.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.bSetCollision.De: Determine whether this device has collision enabled or not.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Can Interact.Des: Determines if players should be able to turn the video player on and off.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Play Automatical: Determines if the the given video should be considered for selection to stream on all video players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Enabled During P: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.InteractTime.Des: Determines the length of interaction required to toggle the switch.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Disable Collisio: Disable collision on this device when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Disable.Descript: Disable the device when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Disable Visibili: Disable the visibility and collision of the video player when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Enable Collision: Enable collision on this device when receiving this event from linked devices.
Enable mirroring to the configured video player. Either hook this up to another players "On Device Transmit Mirror" event or set the device to mirror in this devices options.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.EnablePriority.D: Enable priority mode on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Enable.Descripti: Enable the device when receiving this event from linked devices.
Enable the fullscreen overlay for the video playing on this device when triggered. Note: The video will not immediately show fullscreen, instead an option to enable fullscreen will be shown.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Enable Visibilit: Enable the visibility of the video player when receiving this event from linked devices. This will also enable collision as determined by the Enable Collsion setting, above.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Use Manual Color: Enables setting specific RGB values for the greenscreen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.End External Str: End control by an external streaming source when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Hide PIP.Descrip: Hide the picture-in-picture window when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Attenuation Dist: How far before the sound from the audio begins to trail off. Only used if this is the controlling streaming device.
If any streaming device has forced control of the stream, this will release it and play the best stream in line based on priority.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.ExitFullScreen.D: If fullscreen has been made available then it will be disabled when this is triggered. Note: This will forcibly close any fullscreen videos playing and disable the overlay allowing fullscreen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.EventPageName.De: If this device looks for an Event, this is the name of the CMS Page containing the event to which we should subscribe.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.EventID.Descript: If this device looks for an Event, this is the name of the Event to which we should subscribe.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Always Allow Pic: If this is enabled, then picture-in-picture is always available for when streaming, regardless of distance or viewing angle.
If you have a Custom Video ID you want to display instead of the default stream, you can enter it here. Having anything in this field will cause the device to ignore the "Video to Play" option.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Make PIP Default: Make picture-in-picture default size when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Make PIP Full Sc: Make picture-in-picture full screen when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Behavior On Othe: Only one stream can play at a time. This determines what happens when another streaming device takes control of the stream.
Overriding streaming video with information passed to this event
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Restart.Descript: Restart this stream from the beginning when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Restart When Thi: Restart when This Stream Is Loaded
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Seek.Description: Seek to Triggered Seek Time when receiving this event from linked devices. Caution: The stream will pause while the video buffers when seeking.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.On Stream Starte: Send this event to linked devices when this device becomes the controlling streaming device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.OnDeviceTransmit: Send this event to video player devices when this device plays a stream to begin mirroring to that device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Update To Extern: Set and lock control to an externally-supplied stream source when receiving this event from linked devices.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Manual Color (Bl: Set the blue value of the manual greenscreen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Manual Color (Gr: Set the green value of the manual greenscreen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Manual Color (Re: Set the red value of the manual greenscreen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Picture In Pictu: Sets the ability for players to activate picture-in-picture. This will show whenever you are not looking at a device that has picture-in-picture enabled, or it is very far away (by default).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Screen Shape.Des: Sets the shape for the device screen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.GreenscreenColor: Sets the target color for greenscreening.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.bForceFullscreen: Should fullscreen be opt-in or forcibly turned on.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.EnableDeviceMirr: Should this device mirror another video player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Take Control.Des: Stop the currently playing stream and starts the custom stream on this player with the audio only playing from this device. Stream priority will not work until control is released.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.DeviceNameToMirr: The name of the video player to mirror
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.VideoToPlay.Desc: The selected video will play when this device takes control.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.StreamPriority.D: The streaming priority for this device while in default mode (No mirroring or overrides). All devices in default mode will play the video set on the highest priority device that is enabled and in default mode. (0.0 - 10.0)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.bShowBorder.Desc: This controls showing a border for the device if the selected shape supports borders.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Should Look For: This controls whether or not the device should look for event data from CMS.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Volume.Descripti: This determines the volume multiplier for the device. Only used if this device is the controlling streaming device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.bShowColorValues: This shows the color values for screen locations during playback. This only functions when editing, and acts as a helpful tool for determining the RGB value of a video for Manual Color options.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Stop All Streami: Turn off all video streaming devices of this type on the island when receiving this event from linked devices
Turns on transparency for a set color.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Picture-in-Pictu: When picture-in-picture is active, this value sets the distance beyond which picture-in-picture is always shown. (This value is moderated by the scale of the device)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.bLooping.Descrip: When reaching the end of the video, this determines if the video stops or restarts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.Restart When Thi: When this stream is chosen, this option will restart the video at the beginning when loading.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_VideoPlayer_V3_C.TriggeredSeekTim: When using the "Seek When Receiving From" option, this determines the time (in seconds) to seek to from the start of the video.
